channel.title: Modz + admin
channel.description: I was woundering how to make people modz or administrators on my server?

item.title: Modz + admin
item.dc:creator: @thugscape thugscape
item.description:
@thugscape wrote:

Go to your files. Character open it. and go to the name you want mod or admin or co.
change the player rights to 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for co
[ACCOUNT]
character-username = flap jack
character-password = brandon

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3576
character-posy = 3283
character-rights = 0 <---------- change that to 1-2 or 3 3 is co 2 is admin 1 is mod.
character-ismember = 0
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = adsl-11-101-29.mia.bellsouth.net
character-lastlogin = 20090201
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0

item.title: Modz + admin
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

R4ge Open your source,

Go to the File called

Characters

Double Click it, then Look for the Name of the Account your changing.

Next look for

character-rights = 0

Now Change the 0…

1 Will make you Moderator.
2 Will make you Administrator.
3 Will make you Owner.
4 Will make you Hidden Owner.

Tell me if this works, Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Modz + admin
item.dc:creator: @Travis_02 Travis_02
item.description:
@Travis_02 wrote:

Ok heres how you do it
Bfore you do this have them logout go into your character files in your server find their name and change what i change…
[ACCOUNT]
character-username = account name
character-password = accountpaass

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2326
character-posy = 3680
character-rights = 0

You want to change character rights. character-rights = 0
character-rights = 0
change that to this
character-rights = 2
then save their file and have them login easy…

Read full topic
